## nextTick() function

Same as  but could not be aborted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function nextTick(callback: () => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | () =&gt; void | The callback to call at the end of the event loop. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
